column4: anyone familiar with getting the 3g nano working with rhythmbox or amarok? i'm in need of some assistance
not sure how it would do for importing videos.
so its connected and mounted, what is the problem?
so configure amarok to see it.
if the ipod worked in rhythmbox before you removed it, then the issue isnt' the ipod, its clearly the settings in amarok.
thats what i was thinking but can't figure it out...
open amarok.. and make sure your ipod is plugged in
do you have your ipod plugged in and amarok open?
you know what.. i just plugged in my thumbdrive... amarok used to always ask me if it should handle it. it doesn't and its not in the list of avail media devices
amarok is open and plugged in
ok, did you do what i said?
auto-detect says no new media detected
you'll have to manually mount it in amarok.
